author: On February
title: Young man hit by bus at Carrara on Gold Coast - Yahoo7
text:
Share Young man hit by bus at Carrara on Gold Coast - Yahoo7 A young man is fighting for life on the Gold Coast after being hit by a bus. Close Man fighting for life after hit by bus UP NEXT VIDEO A young man is fighting for life after being rundown by a bus on the Gold Coast. Source: 7 News Man fighting for life after hit by bus 
Itâ€™s believed the 22-year-old was hit on Nerang Broadbeach Road at Carrara around 10pm on Friday night. 
Paramedics raced to the scene and performed first aid. A young man was hit by the bus at Carrara. Source: 7 News The 22 year old remains in a critical condition. Source: 7 News The man was then taken to Gold Coast University Hospital where he remains in a critical condition.
Investigators are speaking to the bus driver to try to find out how the accident happened.
